title: Player 2 Web App
description: A social networking and team building application for gamers. I worked alongside other developers from Drexel Unviersity to integrate the mobile application into a web application. We won first place among the Senior Projects in the Corporate Sponsored category.

title: r3cipe
description: r3cipe is a web app that allows people to easily find high quality recipes and share them with friends. I worked alongside classmates from Drexel University over the course of 4 weeks to build this application for Advanced Web Development (CS-T480). We won first place by popular vote in the class competition.

title: Bamazon Books
description: A basic library system built with React and SQLite. This project was completed as part of the course Advanced Web Development (CS-T480) at Drexel University.

title: LC-2K Assembler / Simulator
description: An implementation of the LC-2K (Assembler and Simulator) in C. The LC-2K is a simple computer architecture used in the Computer Architecture class at Hanyang University (한양대학교), closely resembling the MIPS architecture. This project was completed as part of the course.

title: Conways Game of Death
description: A battle royale version of Conway's Game of Life. Players place gliders in a corner of the board and watch them fight to the death to who will be the last one standing in the simulation. I worked alongside classmates from Drexel University over the course of 4 weeks to build this application.
